title: Strawberry cheesecake pots
ingredients: ['Base', '200g digestive biscuits, crushed', '100g butter, melted', '15g cocoa powder', '30g brown sugar', 'Filling', '250g-300g strawberries, blended', '250g cream cheese', '200g strawberry flavoured yoghurt', '200ml whipping cream, whipped', '15g gelatine', '3 tbsp hot water', '60g caster sugar']
